name: Pixel-Smorse Generator
description:
Procedural generator for toy-ponies similar in style to Hasbro's classic My Little Pony line. Generate your very own Smorses (small-horses), share them with friends, or even manually modify their DNA to create your own!

Reminder: Updates to the generator may erase your local save. Be sure to keep a backup import-code in a text file (with the "Export All" button) if you care about preserving your Smorses.

CHANGELOG
0.7
+ New base-sounds for cries
+ Fixed sprite fencing issues
